items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Attach a cable to a low pulley and hold the handle with an underhand grip.
Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Curl the handle towards your chest by flexing your biceps.
Pause for a second at the top of the movement and squeeze your biceps.
Slowly lower the handle back to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Targets the biceps brachii muscle
Allows for a full range of motion
Provides constant tension on the biceps throughout the movement
Can be easily adjusted to accommodate different fitness levels
Engages the core muscles for stability and balance
Biceps brachii
Brachialis
Brachioradialis
Cable Standing Outer Curl
Cable Standing Hammer Curl
Cable Standing Reverse Curl
Cable Standing Concentration Curl
Cable Standing Preacher Curl
